content.query:
SELECT    o.name AS tableName,  pnp.pdw_node_id,  pnp.distribution_id,   
pnp.rows FROM    sys.pdw_nodes_partitions AS pnp    
JOIN sys.pdw_nodes_tables AS NTables    ON pnp.object_id = NTables.object_id     
AND pnp.pdw_node_id = NTables.pdw_node_id     
JOIN sys.pdw_table_mappings AS TMap    ON NTables.name = TMap.physical_name    
AND substring(TMap.physical_name,40, 10) = pnp.distribution_id    
JOIN sys.objects AS o     ON TMap.object_id = o.object_id    
WHERE o.name in ('orders2')   ORDER BY distribution_id
